title: Semiconductor physics. Part 5. The Transistor
creator_credit: Eric Wylam, Hindle Marriott Edgar and World Wide Animation
brief_description: An explanation of the behaviour of a two-junction (p-n-p) semiconductor device and the necessity for a thin base region, concluding with an explanation of the amplifying action of a transistor. Intended for technical colleges and universities
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Wylam, Hindle Marriott Edgar and World Wide Animation
